column4: you're not going to believe it but my 3d started working again!
I have a feeling that I would've spent more time trying to get THAT working, than just screwing up and accidentally deleting the entire X system, and having it just work when I put it back...
well thanks guys, you've all been a great help
Hi, I'm trying to add an entry to my fstab file, but it has a space in it. How do I go about doing that?
use quotes ("") around the entire entry
did you reboot after you dist-upgraded?
do you mean users who can only log in via vsftpd?
sure. look at vsftpd's virtual users.
well, you can have them as real users on the system, too, and simply disallow them to log in via ssh. See the appropriate directives in man sshd_config
I'm not a linux expert. If I block out ssh and telnet, does that just about restrict them to only ftp?
more than likely, yes. Which chipset specifically?
